localize.text: (Rushed footsteps from behind)
Manager, manager!
My apologies. I am... one minute late.
Welcome to Lobotomy Corporation!
Now, we don't need your theatrics, Malkuth. Please be punctual. Go prepare for the meeting.
Angela is not in a good mood today.
Sephirahs are looking forward to meet you.
Well, maybe not all of them.
Where are my manners! My name is Malkuth! I am in charge of the Control Team!
Lots of responsibilities, really.
I will try my best to help you to enhance the performance of this facility.
I am sure that you're nervous now.
It will take some time for you to get used to things around here.
But don’t worry, I will help you!
I used to be a problem Sephirah, you know.
I once sew the buttons of a shirt in the wrong direction or added salt instead of sugar to some food and...
But that was a long time ago and now I am good!
I will give you an easy task as it's your first day here!
Best of luck!
BAMBAMBAMBAM
I can’t take it anymore! Are you the new manager?
I want to get out of here, please. I know you can fire me. Please, I beg you!
Why do you want to quit? Don’t you like working in the Control Team? I am enjoying my work.
I can't take it anymore! I will go insane. Nothing here is normal.
I think you're the perfect person for the job.
I don't want to be here... I don't want to die...
Ehem... I am sorry for this nonsense. That employee is one of mine. Let me take care of this, please.
Leave it to Malkuth.
Intervene.
I will not disappoint you!
Please do not be alarmed. These things happen often.
Ah, it's your first time.
Usually, Angela or I handle this kind of... situation.
It's just a hiccup. Nothing to worry about.
No, please, no!
You will get used to it, manager.
Once they lose it, there is no chance for them to recover.
The Control Team is like the central nerve system of a human being. If we go down, everyone else goes down.
It was hard for me at first, too.
But I tried really hard!
So please don’t say you can’t.
There was some confusion last time.
I am in charge of the security of your office,
but I forgot to pay attention to the meeting room.
The employee who made a fuss yesterday resigned.
Good job.
You know what it means to ‘resign’ here in the company, don’t you?
I take it as no?
Then it's my fault. Let me explain.
Apparently, some aspects of the company may shock you.
We have a variety of roles here.
Like a well-oiled machine, everyone has their role and they must do their part without errors.
Now, imagine one of the gear wears out faster than others.
It's obvious that the gear would grind down the other gear it is connected and so on.
It would be wise to replace such a gear before it grinds the machine to halt.
That is what we say 'resign.'
Excellent, you did what I asked for!
I knew I could count on you.
Well, to tell you the truth, I was a little worried about you at first.
Oh, how was my day? It was all right, had an emergency protocol drill.
No one was injured or died.
Everybody did a good job!
Not that the team is perfect, though.
By the way, have you seen... them? Some entities that are creepier than the Abnormalities?
I sometimes sense them in the corridors when I am alone.
The drills do no good when you see them. We know nothing about them.
No matter how meticulous the plan is, it can't control the unknown.
They're... I don't know... I am not afraid of them.
I feel something different... Something that...
It's a strange feeling. Something nauseatic, something alien.
What can I say? Something wriggling inside me...
Little by little...
You did your job perfectly again!
I have a lot of work to do.
My to-do list is always full.
But I know I can do it. Just a little more push and...
I am slower than others.
I always check the list or I miss something important.
That's why I have this notebook on me all the time.
Well, it's almost worn out.
It has always been with me since I began working here in the Control Team.
I know Angela worries about me sometimes.
But I am totally in control.
I think I was born for this job, you know.
It would be fine if I am not working for the Control Team as long as the job is similar.
Malkuth, please finish the report I asked by today.
Sure thing, boss! I have it on my list. I will turn in the report by today.
Well, I should go now, it was pleasure talking to you.
The AIs here, they are unstable... except me.
Malkuth is the worst. Haven't you noticed?
I can’t complain as she is easy to control, though.
Let me be honest, Malkuth. You can’t suppress the Ordeals with the employees you have.
Trust me, I am from the Information Team. If you do it by yourself, there would be too much mental damage to the employees.
But Yesod, What we need to think about is the mortality rate of the employees and possibilities of Abnormalities escaping.
Malkuth. Angela said one crazy employees will kill ten others.
I am the Sephirah of the Control Team.
I might make outrageous mistakes in other aspects, but this I know better than anyone else.
I know how to treat employees before they go crazy. I have an action guide for it.
Honestly, I might be the only one who follows the action guide.
Tell me if you need it. I can always share it with you.
I... I’m okay, but that action guide..
I don’t need weak employees in my department.
Weakness means death.
To be in the Control Team means to be better than everyone else.
Please say something, manager.
Weren’t you watching what happened to the weak employees?
Would you guys please say something?
Well, thank you so much for visiting me, I was so happy!
Let’s meet up again next time with the upper Sephirahs!
I will let them know.
The mental corruption of the Control Team employees exceeded the maximum limit. What did the other Sephirahs do in the meantime?
The Control Team failed to handle Ordeals.
Get more employees and stop the Ordeals. I will ask other departments for support.
...Hello!
I am busy, I still haven't finished even half of what's written in this notebook.
I heard extraction experiments would be conducted.
I saw the list of participants, but I was not able to find my name on it.
Well, I mean there's probably tons of reasons behind it and maybe I'm not good enough for the experiment yet,
but may I join the experiment as well?
I learned a lot here.
I am very sure I can help in some way.
I won’t disappoint you!
Hello, manager!
It’s sad not having enough talent, isn’t it?
If someone doesn’t look back, what does that mean?
Does not acknowledge you.
Does not care about you at all.
No need to analyze your action, as a conclusion was already made.
Did you ever scrape the floor, writhing in pain?
It sounds very painful.
But actually you feel nothing even when you lose your fingernails.
You stare at our lost fingernails, and just before you lose your consciousness,
when you feel you are not yourself anymore, then you start to laugh really hard.
Even though it’s not funny at all.
And on the ground someone's shadow looking down and the feet were seen.
Whose feet were those?
When the person finally turned around, everything was over.
Did you see the fragments of despair from there?
Or were you staring at your fingernails on the floor?
That is the exact moment I felt helplessness.
Without you, I would’ve never known the feeling, thank you!
Then, what about you, manager?
Have you ever felt helplessness of not being able to control anything?
When uncontrollable things rain down from somewhere that is not my body, that moment of helplessness of not being able to control yourself is an awful feeling.
Please tell me, so,
I can feel rewarded a bit.
Elijah was impatient. Her impatience caused common mistakes.
She once when on a long, winding explanation of why she needed to finish the experiment, but she didn't remember.
Whenever she said she is not authorized, I could see the strong desire in her eyes. She was obsessed, craving for it.
The sound of her footsteps may make others turn around.
Cogito was something that was not accessible with her authority.
The only thing she could do was to record the change of her subjects.
She knew that Cogito was not ready for humans.
When I realized what was going on, half of her teeth were gone, and...
Kill me... Kill me...
Ignore.
Ignore.
Ignore.
Hello, A!
I am very, very glad to join this team!
I forgot to introduce myself! My name is....! I will try my best to help the team!
I was writing a report, where did it go?
Nothing can be done with only passion.
It's clear what mistakes being impatient brings, so we needed to take the time.
The situation was not good enough to permit memorizing names or responding to meaningless gestures.
It wasn't after a very long time had passed that I thought giving praise once in awhile may be good.
Ask if eveything's okay.
Say hello.
You are so random.
I think you confuse us as human beings sometimes.
I feel like I had a dream for the first time in a while.
Other Sephirahs told me that I damaged the facility a lot.
Have you ever felt it, manager?
The feeling of sailing the ocean without any map.
It’s like you are groping through darkness.
I feel like an island on the vast ocean.
I am in the Control Team.
Nobody knows how much pressure I get to command everyone.
I am sure you know how it feels.
Everything collapses when you start to think you might be not able to do it.
Have you ever seen the eyes of dying employees?
Don't avoid them saying there's nothing you can do for them.
Don’t be sorry to the dying sacrifices,
don’t blame yourself thinking you could’ve done better.
Only after you can see things the way they are,
can you also see other things.
I saw you overcoming unavoidable ordeals. Those ordeals probably originated from me.
To be honest, I didn’t think you would make it.
....Am I being too honest?
We can’t change the past, I know.
I don’t expect you to be a shining beacon or that this place will suddenly become peaceful and warm.
But...
Maybe I can just try to wait.
We will take all those horrible moments,
while you take the pain.
.... Just like now.
